challenge.title: Step 3
challenge.description: Create a selector for your .wheel element. Start by setting the border to 2px solid black, the border-radius to 50%, and the margin-left to 50px.

tests.text: Your .wheel selector should have a border property set to 2px solid black.
Your .wheel selector should have a border-radius property set to 50%.
Your .wheel selector should have a margin-left property set to 50px.
